snippet.title: koreader/kindlepdfviewer
snippet.description:
A PDF (plus DJVU, ePub, TXT, CHM, FB2, HTML...) viewer made for e-ink framebuffer devices, using muPDF, djvulibre, crengine
Last updated August 21, 2013

snippet.title: cdhigh/KindleEar
snippet.description:
A website application running in Google app engine, deliver rss news to your kindle. generate mobi by using python, multilanguages supported.
Last updated April 18, 2014

snippet.title: mhl/guardian-for-kindle
snippet.description:
A script to generate an edition of the Guardian for reading on the Amazon Kindle using the Guardian Open Platform
Last updated August 04, 2013

snippet.title: edavis10/kindle
snippet.description:
A collection of classes and scripts that can be used to manage a kindle notes files.
Last updated January 19, 2012

snippet.title: johnpaulhayes/Kindle-Highlights
snippet.description:
Use the Kindle app on your devices and want to share your highlights? Then this is for you.
Last updated February 29, 2012

snippet.title: apetresc/Kindle-Widget-Toolkit
snippet.description:
The KWT is a set of KComponents to be used with the Kindle Development Kit to create compelling user interfaces for Kindle Active Content.
Last updated August 25, 2010

snippet.title: wiese/kindlefeeder
snippet.description:
A helper for using KindleFeeder
Last updated February 17, 2012

snippet.title: KrisYu/kindlenotes
snippet.description:
use on Mac,split My Clippings.txt by booktitle
Last updated February 24, 2013

snippet.title: GaZ3ll3/kindlepusher
snippet.description:
without using rss, target website as statesmen.com
Last updated April 05, 2013

snippet.title: minejo/kindle-clips
snippet.description:
Use My Clippings.txt to export Highlights and Note
Last updated February 18, 2014
